text: Peer Augustinski (June 25, 1940 â€“ October 3, 2014) was a German actor and voice actor. He was born in Berlin. He was the official German dub-over artist of Robin Williams. Augustinski voice dubbed nearly all of Williams' work such as Awakenings, Toys, Good Will Hunting, Aladdin, and Dead Poets Society. Augustinski died in Cologne, aged 74. ==Other websites== * * Category:1940 births Category:2014 deaths Category:German movie actors Category:German voice actors Category:Actors from Berlin
title: Peer Augustinski
